item.title: April add a quote by Walter Dean Myers
item.description:
"She is a moron and too dumb to menstruate straight.
--perhaps the best line from <i>Shooter</i>" -- Walter Dean Myers

item.title: April add a quote by P.G. Wodehouse
item.description: "There is no surer foundation for a beautiful friendship than a mutual taste in literature." -- P.G. Wodehouse

item.title: April add a quote by P.G. Wodehouse
April add a quote by Wodehouse
item.description: "Her pupils were at once her salvation and her despair. They gave her the means of supporting life, but they made life hardly worth supporting. " -- Wodehouse

item.title: April add a quote by P.G. Wodehouse
item.description: "I am not always good and noble. I am the hero of this story, but I have my off moments." -- P.G. Wodehouse

item.title: April add a quote by Winston S. Churchill
item.description: "Success is not final, failure is not fatal: it is the courage to continue that counts." -- Winston S. Churchill

item.title: April add a quote by Winston S. Churchill
item.description: "My tastes are simple: I am easily satisfied with the best." -- Winston S. Churchill

item.title: April add a quote by Winston S. Churchill
item.description: "History will be kind to me for I intend to write it." -- Winston S. Churchill

item.title: April add a quote by Winston Churchill
item.description: "Never give in. Never give in. Never, never, never, never—in nothing, great or small, large or petty—never give in, except to convictions of honour and good sense. Never yield to force. Never yield to the apparently overwhelming might of the enemy." -- Winston Churchill

item.title: April add a quote by Winston S. Churchill
item.description: "If you have an important point to make, don't try to be subtle or clever. Use a pile driver. Hit the point once. Then come back and hit it again. Then hit it a third time - a tremendous whack." -- Winston S. Churchill

item.title: April add a quote by Winston S. Churchill
item.description: "The era of procrastination, of half-measures, of soothing and baffling expedients, of delays is coming to its close. In its place we are entering a period of consequences." -- Winston S. Churchill

item.title: April add a quote by Winston Churchill
item.description: "The most important thing about education is appetite." -- Winston Churchill

item.title: April add a quote by Winston Churchill
item.description: "All of the great empires of the future will be empires of the mind." -- Winston Churchill
